ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Consensus roadmap balancing contributors, funding, and stability.

bullets.item: Adopts LTS cadence with clear BC policy.
Institutes RFC-lite for medium changes and full RFC for breaking ones.
Sets funding tiers tied to SLA-like community support metrics.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Introduce LTS branches with deprecation windows and BC policy.
Improve DX via templates, triage rotations, and mentorship.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Funding diversification reduces volatility; publish budget and KPIs.
